Package citadelles.bots

Class SmartBot

java.lang.Object
citadelles.bots.Bot
citadelles.bots.SmartBot
public class SmartBot extends Bot
Class that contain all the logic of the smart bot

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Adds the hand of the bot and a list of the placed quarters.

  • Constructor Details

    • SmartBot

      public SmartBot(int id, Hand hand)
      Adds the hand of the bot and a list of the placed quarters. initializes the number of golds to 2.

  • Method Details

    • chooseCardOrGold

      public void chooseCardOrGold()
      Logic to choose if the bot will draw card or get gold If he has the architect then he takes gold If he has a lot of gold (>5) and less than 2 cards then he draws cards If he has 0 cards, then he draws Otherwise he takes gold
      Overrides:
      chooseCardOrGold in class Bot

    • eventuallyPlaceADistrict

      public void eventuallyPlaceADistrict()
      Method choosing if the bot will construct a district or not
      Overrides:
      eventuallyPlaceADistrict in class Bot

    • getMaxPlaceableDistrict

      private District getMaxPlaceableDistrict()
      get the highest placeable district of the hand and if they are multiple choose one of a color that is not already placed on the board.
      Returns:
      the district to place

    • logicArchitect

      public ArrayList<District> logicArchitect()
      Logic of the bot if he is the Architect He tries to place a special district or his best card but check before himself if he has enough golds
      Overrides:
      logicArchitect in class Bot
      Returns:
      An arrayList of district to place

    • logicAssassin

      public int logicAssassin()
      Logic of the bot if he is the Assassin Murders a random character other than himself
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      The id of the character to kill

    • logicWarlord

      public int[] logicWarlord()
      Logic of the bot if he is the Warlord Destruct the max value district in the city of the more advanced player
      Overrides:
      logicWarlord in class Bot
      Returns:
      A tab of int containing the player who will lose a district and the district to destroy

    • logicThief

      public int logicThief()
      Logic of the bot if he is the Thief Steals from a character other than himself and the Assassin
      Overrides:
      logicThief in class Bot
      Returns:
      The character id to steal

    • logicMagician

      public int logicMagician()
      Logic of the bot if he is the Magician If he has less than 3 card in hand, Swap cards with the person who has the most cards. If not, exchange with the deck the cards he already has. Return an int == -1 to exchange all his cards with the deck Return an 0 <= int < nbBot to exchange the hand with bot hand
      Overrides:
      logicMagician in class Bot

    • logicLaboratory

      public int logicLaboratory()
      Logic if the bot has the Laboratory district If he has more than one card and less than 3 gold, he chooses to exchange a card with a value lower than 3 (if he has one) for a gold
      Overrides:
      logicLaboratory in class Bot
      Returns:
      The index of a card in his hand. -1 if he can't

    • logicFactory

      public boolean logicFactory()
      Logic if the bot has the Factory district If he has more than 7 gold and less than 3 cards in his hand, then he decides to exchange 3 golds for 3 cards
      Overrides:
      logicFactory in class Bot
      Returns:
      True if he wants to use the Factory power

    • logicGraveyard

      public boolean logicGraveyard(District destructedDistrict)
      Logic if the bot has the Graveyard district If the destroyed district has already been placed by the player then he does not buy it. Otherwise, if it is a special district, he buys it. If not, he buys it only if the value of the district is higher than 2.
      Overrides:
      logicGraveyard in class Bot
      Parameters:
      destructedDistrict - The district that has been destroyed
      Returns:
      True if the bot want to re-buy it

      public Character chooseOneCharacter(ArrayList<Character> charactersPicked)
